string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: \"In school, you\'re taught a lesson and then given a test. In life, you\'re given a test that teaches you a lesson.\"
\"Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.\"
\"The mere imparting of information is not education.\"
\"When a subject becomes totally obsolete we make it a required course\"
\"If I were again beginning my studies, I would follow the advice of Plato and start with mathematics.\"
\"A child miseducated is a child lost.\"
\"Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.\"
\"The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.\"
\"Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.\"
\"An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.\"
\"The philosophy of the school room in one generation will be the philosophy of government in the next.\"
\"The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.\"
\"The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future in life.\"
\"Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.\"
\"Education is learning what you didn\'t even know you didn\'t know.\"
\"A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car; but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.\"
\"Change is the end result of all true learning.\"
\"All I want is an education, and I am afraid of no one.\"
\"Poor is the pupil who does not surpass his master.\"
\"Rewards and punishments are the lowest form of education.\"
\"Observation more than books, and experience more than persons, are the prime educators.\"
\"The only real failure in life is one not learned from.\"
\"What sculpture is to a block of marble, education is to the soul.\"
\"Education, n.: That which discloses to the wise and disguises from the foolish their lack of understanding.\"
\"Much education today is monumentally ineffective. All too often we are giving young people cut flowers when we should be teaching them to grow their own plants.\"
\"No man who worships education has got the best out of education… Without a gentle contempt for education no man\'s education is complete.\"
\"You know what I like a lot more than this new Lamborghini here? KNAAWLEDGE!\"
